documents.document: RT @gavinclerkin77: @sweetpmac You tell them , Pauline McSwainey ....🤔😂
The misspelling of my last name will be the absolute ruin of me and my patience. Drives me BONKERS. Particularly when someone wants something 😂 C’mon like, way to get off on the wrong foot!
Shoes off, bra off and these days - pants off. 🙌🏾 https://t.co/V3GV61nlNZ

Netflix has banned staff from looking at each other for more than 5 seconds! Also no hugging, no asking for a colleague’s number, and no flirting. Shout “stop, don’t do that again!” if a colleague breaks said rules.
Good rules or PC gone mad? Any strange rules where you work?
@Trevttrev Trevor for president! 😂
@ArcticChimpanze Otherwise it’s just a burritNO

Happy Monday everyone! Back on @TodayFM right now https://t.co/Z0OdnwFLs6
@Aoife_Dooley I find older people and boys with hurt feelings (🙄) the worst culprits. Aoife go shopping and buy the dresses! I like online stuff from ASOS and Boohoo ☺️ Happy shopping! 😘

@Aoife_Dooley I wouldn’t have a stitch to wear if I was waiting for a day I had a “hot bod.” And two fingers up to everyone who’s told me I’d be prettier if I was thinner (I’ve had that countless times too.) I like how I look, weight on or off, that seems to annoy people 🤷🏽‍♀️Go shopping!!
@ArcticChimpanze Or they dice up a raw chicken fillet... and then wipe their hands on a tea towel before carrying on 🤢
The cooking part of live TV magazine shows stresses me out. They never allow enough time for them, and they’re always rushing through it. Every single time, on every single programme.
@hatchetcol Hahaha 😂
Quarth: the greatest city that ever was or ever will be.
RT @Kevin_Symes: Every time Victoria Beckham has pointed in a Spice Girls music video https://t.co/9sn6CDLGUM

@rickygervais I watched #Humanity back in March on holidays in the mankiest hotel in Tenerife, while lying on the bathroom floor thinking I would die of morning sickness. I managed to laugh through my heaving. And I roared laughing... thanks!
@AlZheimerHammer It is such bullshit 😂

“I don’t know what’s worse; this shit game of Gaelic football or Love Island” - husband.
Love Island, definitely. After 3 days of “liking” someone, these 2 are now “breaking up”. What?! It’s so childish 😂
Yes I’m still watching 🙄
@AlZheimerHammer @MaiaDunphy @TaraFlynn @Jim_Sheridan Haha! Good woman 🙌🏽
RT @AlZheimerHammer: 😂😂😂👏👏 This is brilliant! 😋 @MaiaDunphy @sweetpmac @TaraFlynn @Jim_Sheridan https://t.co/QZDi09WRB3
@Melfinn1 Argh those teeny toes!! 😍 Massive congrats to you all ☺️😘
@anthonycahill11 No, it’s a Dublin thing. Just saying.
@noreen_ahern I mean ticks. It’s a thing. And they’re all ticks.
@MauraONeill1 If the cap fits 😂
@HomeAndDesignIE It’s desperately sad to think more people applied to be on Love Island this year than applied to Oxford or Cambridge. Bualadh bos, UK!

@mac19820810 They couldn’t love anyone more than they love themselves! I’m watching in amazement here. One of them just said she doesn’t know any big words 😂 (she just asked what superficial meant, the irony!)
Finally watching Love Island for the first time. It’s the most cringe thing I’ve ever seen! All these beautiful ticks desperate for fame 😂
@AlZheimerHammer @DoneganGardens Same! It’s now the law, bye everyone 👋🏽
RT @DoneganGardens: Tidy up your garden. It’s the law. X https://t.co/rczjZ3v50I
@ElayneOHara I’m trying. The only thing I’m enjoying so far is the liberal use of the word “scoundrel”. Magnificent.
Ross Poldark, not Randy.
I’m on episode 2 of Poldark and I’m trying to like it, I really am, but so far... as Randy off American Idol would say; it’s a no from me dawg. He’s barely even got his shirt off too!

RT @TodayFM: The #IFTAs took place in the RDS last night. 🏆

@SBlaneyParslow @FlangeFlanders @SimonHarrisTD @campaignforleo @ICGPnews Oh that’s good to know - thank you!

HELLO FRIDAY YOU SEXY RASCAL! Doing lunchtime on @TodayFM and I shall be speaking to @CraigDavid - woo! LIKE, ACTUAL CRAIG DAVID! I also have 10 tix to @taylorswift13 to give away! Aaaand there'll be a few songs too. Come and say hi at 12!
@FlanoMark @FlangeFlanders @SimonHarrisTD @campaignforleo @ICGPnews Aaaand my nausea is back!

@FlangeFlanders @SimonHarrisTD @campaignforleo @ICGPnews None of my local ones would accept me, had to go a town over and she was mean! Told me I wasn’t pregnant because she couldn’t see the line coz she forgot her glasses 😳 you couldn’t make it up! I was so upset (hormonal, upset and very much pregnant 😂)

@FlangeFlanders @SimonHarrisTD @campaignforleo @ICGPnews That's awful. I had awful trouble getting a GP when I found out I was pregnant.... and I'm in Dublin. Nobody would accept me! I went to one, and won't be returning to her. Don't know what I'm going to do for the rest of my pregnancy 🤷🏾‍♀️
@Siemens @Dyson @SiemensHome Thanks guys - do you have an email address I can send details to? It’s a small part we need.

@RingTed @Fi_Barrett @Dyson @Siemens @01 I’m Paula and I like to make up really boring lies about differing qualities of customer service and tweet about it 🤷🏽‍♀️

@RingTed @Dyson @Siemens @01 I already did that. My point was the difference between the 2 was Dyson had the part in the post that day, Siemens couldn’t tell me anything about where to get the part. Don’t need an engineer, certainly don’t expect one for free. You make assumptions... hun.

@NehpetsKelly Well I mean if he removes his leg and shoots someone with it, there may be a case but the only thing he’s guilty of as far as I can see is mutilating his lovely leg with a manky tatt.
I didn’t even know what a Raheem Sterling was until today and it turns out he’s some bloke with a tattoo people don’t like. Suddenly, he’s public enemy #1. His body, his choice, no?
